Features.FastTravelOverlay.Title: Fast Travel Map Overlay
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.Dele: Are you sure you want to delete this Fast Travel Node? You can add the node again, by interacting with the same {0}.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblT: Give a unique name to the node.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblE: Disable rarely used nodes, so that frequently travelled paths are highlighted.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblS: Draws a line between both end-points of the {0}.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblN: Override the default colour to highlight different paths.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblD: Delete the node from the map. You can add the node again, by interacting with the same {0}.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblN: Interact with a Translocator, or Teleporter, to add a Fast Travel node to this map.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblT: Set the default colour for all translocator paths on the map.
Set the default colour for all teleporter paths on the map.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblE: Set the default colour for all broken paths on the map.
Set the opacity for all broken paths on the map.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblD: Set the default colour for all disabled paths on the map.
Set the opacity for all disabled paths on the map.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblP: Change the width of the paths on the map.
Features.FastTravelOverlay.Dialogue.lblN: Change the size of the nodes on the map.
